title: BitcoinCopy $BTCC
author: BitcoinCopy $BTCC
content: BitcoinCopy ($BTCC) ICO - Bitcointalk AnnouncementSupply: 21.000.000 $BTCCICO Price at Start: 0.31$ per $BTCCSmart Contract: 0x7e166919A50906B70D4B507A6bb23b9D8072B98cICO listed at: ICOHolder, Foundico, ICOLink.- Listed at Coincodex at the ICO Section- Already listed at Coincheckup “without any reflection”Blockchain Explorer: https://bscscan.comDirect Link: https://bscscan.com/token/0x7e166919A50906B70D4B507A6bb23b9D8072B98cSame Supply like Bitcoin.Decimals: 18, Bep20 TokenPresale ICO, 1 Round Start: 6 August 2022Presale ICO, 1 Round End: 6 January 2023ICO Price in Round 1 = 0,31 USD per $BTCCPresale ICO, 2 Round Start: 6 January 2023Presale ICO, 2 Round End: 6 February 2023ICO Price in Round 2 = 0,33 USD per $BTCCBitcoinCopy $BTCC funds itself. We are able to go on almost every Cryptocurrency Exchange with it. What we promise, is that we bring #BTCC according to the invest’s on Exchanges and establish the Project on the Market.Minimum to Participate at the ICO is 31 USD in the first round ans 33 USD in the second round.We accept USDT, BTC, ETH, BNB, USDC, BUSD, SEPA, Swift and Credit Card Payments.Website: https://www.bitcoincopy.net/Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitcoincopybtcc Github: https://github.com/BitcoinCopy Telegram: https://t.me/BTCC_Chat ICO Sells via Mail, Linkedin, Twitter or TelegramProbably very soon with the IEO on the best Exchange for Cryptocurrency. We have published all proofs in our Telegram Chat. We are in talks currently and have applied a long time ago. The Mails of them are legit, we checked it over 3 different Ways. Official Verification Link, Support and Twitter Support.*We guess everyone knows the Exchange what we mean, but we don't want to publish it everywhere before the official announcement from their Side.Linktree: https://linktr.ee/bitcoincopy_btcc Join our Community and be active please. As so called Memecoin a good Community is important.We keep an eye on quality and not quantity. Please don't Spam in our Community. Thank You.

comments.body: Yes, probably. We are currently in talk with them. We applied for binance labs long time ago.We checked the request over their verification link, their support and their twitter support-Everytime it was getting confirmed by them, so we have a legit contact to there now.Thanks for your answer and interests.Best Regards
